Package org.alljoyn.bus.annotation

This package contains the various annotations that are specific to AllJoyn.

See:
          Description

Annotation Types Summary
AccessPermission Indicates peer access permission requirement on the Method.
BusInterface Indicates that a given Java interface is also an AllJoyn interface.
BusMethod Indicates that a particular member of an AllJoyn exportable interface is defined to be a AllJoyn method.
BusProperty Indicates that a particular member of an AllJoyn exportable interface is defined to be a AllJoyn property.
BusSignal Indicates that a particular member of an AllJoyn exportable interface is defined to be a AllJoyn signal.
BusSignalHandler Indicates that a method should receive AllJoyn signals.
Position Indicates the numeric position of a field within an AllJoyn struct (Java class).
Secure Indicates that a given interface is secured by an authentication mechanism.
Signature Declares the AllJoyn data type of a Java data type.
 

Package org.alljoyn.bus.annotation Description

This package contains the various annotations that are specific to AllJoyn.
